scripts.lint: node --check src/main.js && node --check src/itinerary.js && node --check shared/day-history.js
scripts.build: vite build && mkdir -p dist/saturday dist/shared && cp saturday/index.html dist/saturday/index.html && cp saturday/README.md dist/saturday/README.md && cp shared/day-history.js dist/shared/day-history.js
